code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}}}%%

stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-06.02 — Project Lifecycle (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)

[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> PLANNED : ProjectCreated (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
note right of PLANNED
  Project registered in local hub context  
  • proposal approved via Governance (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)  
  • hub assigns steward and metadata  
  • initial budget & milestones defined
end note

PLANNED --> ACTIVE : MilestoneStarted
note right of ACTIVE
  Work phase begins  
  • contributions logged in PoC (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)  
  • funding stream initiated via Treasury (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)  
  • progress tracked in Metrics (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
end note

ACTIVE --> REVIEW : MilestoneReported (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
note right of REVIEW
  Evaluate milestone completion:  
  • quantitative (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)  
  • qualitative (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)  
  • peer validation or ethics guard review
end note

REVIEW --> APPROVED : MilestoneApproved (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
REVIEW --> REJECTED : MilestoneRejected
REJECTED --> ACTIVE : ReworkSubmitted
APPROVED --> NEXT_PHASE : NextMilestonePlanned
NEXT_PHASE --> ACTIVE : PhaseStarted

APPROVED --> COMPLETED : AllMilestonesDone (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
note right of COMPLETED
  Project closed successfully  
  • Treasury marks payout complete  
  • final SRI contribution logged
end note

COMPLETED --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

%% ---- Exceptional paths ----
ACTIVE --> PAUSED : ResourceShortage / GovernanceHold
PAUSED --> ACTIVE : ResumeAuthorized
PAUSED --> CANCELLED : CancelledByGovernance
CANCELLED --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] : ProjectTerminated (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)

%% ---- Maintenance / metrics sync ----
ACTIVE --> SYNC : SyncToFederation
SYNC --> ACTIVE : SyncComplete

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class PLANNED,ACTIVE,REVIEW,APPROVED,NEXT_PHASE,COMPLETED,PAUSED,CANCELLED,REJECTED,SYNC core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController'。
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker 的逻辑。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker'，对吧？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 的分支。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController 和 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode'。
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 的环节。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream处理 才对。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream处理'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
